title: Responding to Russia (with Mark Francois MP)
itunes:title: Responding to Russia (with Mark Francois MP)
description:
Conservative MP Mark Francois discusses the need for robust U.K. sanctions against Russia over Ukraine. He tells Bloomberg’s Caroline Hepker this has nothing to do with post-Brexit Britain.

Plus IPSOS Mori U.K. CEO Kelly Beaver tells us how voters are focused on the cost of living squeeze, the unpopularity of Boris Johnson and changing their job.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
